summary: Results-oriented Project Administrator with 14+ years' experience in the toy manufacturing industry. Proven ability to manage diverse needs in deadline-driven environments, lead cross-functional teams, and deliver projects on time and on budget.

experience.title: Sr. Project Management Associate
experience.description: Manage projects from original concept through final implementation for moderately complex toys and high volume SKUs; meet milestones and deadlines; ensure projects stay on budget; projects generate over $2M in annual sales; facilitate weekly cross-functional team meetings; travel to China and Indonesia plants; utilize Agile platform to track milestones in product lifecycle.

experience.title: Administrative Assistant
experience.description: Design VP, Director and three Design Managers calendar management; coordinate meetings and special projects; manage travel arrangements; create purchase requisitions and process AP; coordinate events; monthly budget tracking; general office support.

experience.title: Administrative Assistant
experience.description: Executive support for 4 Client Communications Directors; coordinate appointments and events; office-wide point of contact for calls; manage travel; maintain files and databases; process travel expenses.

experience.title: Intern, Office Manager Assistant
experience.description: Maintain high-end fashion showroom; assist fashion stylist and celebrity clientele; prepare press kits; manage client database; inventory control; support special projects.

experience.title: Sales Associate
experience.description: Customer service; set up visual merchandising; meet sales targets; product knowledge; teamwork.

experience.title: Project Administrator
experience.description: Manage Mainline Barbie product development; liaison with Orient Plant and Vendor Operations; sourcing, purchasing, and tooling; maintain cost targets; support marketing with advertising and events; coordinate toy fairs; manage samples and shipping to subsidiaries; received awards for Best New Product launch (2004) and Excellent Customer Service.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science Degree: Business Management
